description:
The investigation takes Hiraga and Roberto deep into the Forest of the Decapitating Clown as they trace the steps of Carlo`s video. In the darkness, does Hell truly await?
Source: amazon

titles.title: L`or des ténèbres – Je suis avec le Seigneur
The Gold of the Darkness; I Am with the Lord
Yami no Kogane, Ware, Shu to Tomoni
闇の黄金, 我, 主とともに
